software_agent

Class Producer

  • java.lang.Object
    • software_agent.Producer

  • public class Producer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class requests jobs from the Aggregator Manager for execution.
    See Also:
    NmapJob, Threadpool, OneTimeJob, PeriodicJob

    • Constructor Detail

      • Producer

        public Producer(int waitTime,
        int hashKey,
        java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<NmapJob> queue,
        java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<Results> results,
        java.util.List<java.lang.Thread> threads)
        This is the constructor of a Producer object

        The constructor initializes all the fields of Producer object

        Parameters:
        waitTime - the time to wait before requesting the next batch of jobs
        hashKey - the identification key of the Software Agent
        queue - the BlockingQueue where the OneTimeJobs are placed
        results - the BlockingQueue where the results of "nmap" command are placed
        threads - the List where all threads are stored to terminate normally

    • Method Detail

      • startJobs

        public void startJobs()
        Requests jobs from the Aggregator Manager. If the job is :
        • periodic, the SA creates a new PeriodicJob thread
        • one time, the SA inserts the job in the queue, then a OneTimeJob thread consumes the job.
        • deleting, the SA interrupts the thread executing the job
        • exiting, the SA creates a new thread invoking System.exit(0);
